command.description: Tool to convert Trac tickets to Github issues

option.name: verbose
option.description: Turns on verbose mode. Shows JSON output sent to Github.

option.name: config
option.description: Specify configuration file name. If not specified, config.json in the current directory is used.

option.name: ticket_offset
option.description: Where to start converting tickets. By default, tickets are converted from the first ticket. Ignored if --skip-tickets is used.

option.name: ticket_limit
option.description: Maximum number of tickets to convert. By default, all tickets are converted. Ignored if --skip-tickets is used.

option.name: comment_offset
option.description: Where to start converting comments. By default, comments are converted from the first comment. Ignored if --skip-comments is used.

option.name: comment_limit
option.description: Maximum number of comments to convert. By default, all comments are converted. Ignored if --skip-comments is used.
